data.name: VELASTER
data.detailed_description:
Middle-earth space - Malum


In the past, demons and angels followed a rule that could not invade the realm of human habitation. However, the need between angels and demons required a space where they could coexist. Since they are not gods, they cannot create from nothing. They dragged some of these inhabited areas from humans and created a place called Middle-earth. Middle-earth became the coexistence of angels, demons, and humans, some of whom were drawn from the Middle-earth birth. It was called Malum. However, the peace they have built up is overthrown too easily through minor disputes, turning into a terrible war of blood and flesh and maggots. Twisted, corrupted, and rotting under countless piles of corpses, Malum begins to contaminate all living things within...

For revenge...


You must survive in a dark, hazy and misty Mallum in a bloody battle against grotesque and horrific monsters.
You don't know who you are, where you are, or why you have to fight the monsters before your eyes. But somewhere inside the castle that rises in the distance. put a knife in your heart
All I know is that a target of revenge awaits. But you are too weak to seek revenge. Smell of sulfur and rotting flesh
Survive the terrifying space and become strong enough to quench your wrath.

Features


Survive the terrible and powerful monsters.
Monsters with only instincts will try to kill you for no reason. Face the monsters. Knock it down, get stronger, and move on.

The style you want...

You can play the game by choosing one of three characters.
Each character has a completely different attack method, skills, and combos.
Choose the one you like the most and join them on the journey.


Knights use swords and shields.
Slash down your enemies with a shining sword full of divine power, and bring down punishment.


The twin swords are acrobatic movements and quickly swing the swords in both hands to cut through everything.
Play with your enemies and stop breathing before you even notice death.


Hammer is a strong and reliable warrior wielding a heavy hammer.
Slam your enemies in the head with a hammer full of fury.



Powerful boss monsters.

There are boss monsters all over the world of Velaster that cannot be defeated by simply swinging a sword.
They are absurdly powerful and can frustrate you, but if you fall over and over again, get up and win.

data.short_description: VELASTER is a gruesome 2.5D side-scrolling action combat game set in the Middle-earth called Malum. You will find yourself growing in battles against various monsters and bosses. Take revenge that remains in your fading memories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not suitable for all ages or content that may be inappropriate for use at work: frequent violence or gore, general adult content
